name: Long Drive:Golf Battle
description:
Long Drive: Golf Battle is a casual golf game where you play against users from all over the world to see who can hit the ball the farthest.

Each driver and ball has own special abilities. You can buy and upgrade them to hit further and win.
Make a good use of field objects, sometimes it could get you a lucky shot and save you from the hazard.

Long Drive: The game rule is very simple. You do driver shots only.

[Main Features]
- You can compete against users from all over the world.
- Simple controls - just touch & drag.
- There are many drivers, balls, and caddies with different abilities and design.
- You can upgrade your drivers.
- Various realistic 3D golf courses.
- Take advantage of various objects within the map to make the ball go farther than you can ever imagine.
- Play against your friends online.

Join today in Long Drive Championship and compete with other sluggers in real-time!
Become the king of Long Drive!
